title: Girl Number One
description: As a young child, Eleanor Blackwood witnessed her mother's murder in woods near their farm. The killer was never found.  Now an adult, Eleanor discovers a woman's body in the same spot in the Cornish woods where her mother was strangled eighteen years before. But when the police get there, the body has disappeared.  Is Eleanor’s disturbed mind playing tricks on her again, or has her mother’s killer resurfaced? And what does the number on the dead woman’s forehead signify?
author: Jane Holland
